Articles.Content:
Good day to all,

Just wanted to say hello to all the Kerbinauts out there. I was recently introduced to this game / simulator and instantly got hooked. A friend told me about it and sent me a link to the Scott Manley videos on Youtube and that sank the hook. I look forward to being a part of this forum and hope to learn much more about KSP.

Binker

Good day, and greetings from next to British Columbia.

If you play KSP, you will learn much more. Take my word for it!

There is an enormous amount of good learning to be had here in the forums and in the tutorials.

Happy landings!
I wish that we would have heard, "Of course, I could be wrong" from the Thiokol engineers before the Challenger launch.

Greetings Binker! Glad to have you aboard! Bring the glories of Kerbal Space Program to Canada for us, will you?!

Regards,

Northstar

Greetings from the territory's

got ksp on Christmas so much fun
